verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%>, <S%G5217>Go<s%> <S%G2532>ye<s%>, and pour <S%G1632>out<s%> the seven <S%G5357>bowls<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G565>went<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G1096>became<s%> a <S%G2556>noisome<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4190>grievous<s%> <S%G1668>sore<s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the second1208, 32 poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> of a <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2532>man<s%>; and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G599>died<s%>, even the things that were <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the third5154, 32 poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4215>rivers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>the<s%> <S%G4077>fountains<s%> of the <S%G5204>waters<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G5204>waters<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1342>Righteous<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G5607>thou<s%>, who art <S%G2532>and<s%> who <S%G2258>wast<s%>, 2532, 3741 thou Holy <S%G2962>One<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> thou didst <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%>:

for <S%G3754><s%> they <S%G1632>poured<s%> out the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> hast thou <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%>: <S%G1063><s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I heard191, 243 <S%G1537>the<s%> <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G3483>Yea<s%>, O <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, the <S%G3841>Almighty<s%>, <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> are <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2920>judgments<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the fourth5067, 32 poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2739>it<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G846>it<s%> to <S%G2739>scorch<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G444>men<s%> were <S%G2739>scorched<s%> with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2738>heat<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the fifth3991, 32 poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G4656>darkened<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3145>gnawed<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1100>tongues<s%> <S%G1537>for<s%> <S%G4192>pain<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4192>pains<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1537>sores<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the sixth1623, 32 poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%>, the river <S%G2166>Euphrates<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> was dried <S%G3583>up<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> might by made <S%G2090>ready<s%> for the <S%G935>kings<s%> that come <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2246>the<s%> <S%G395>sunrising<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> coming out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G1404>dragon<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the false <S%G5578>prophet<s%>, <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%>, as it <S%G3664>were<s%> <S%G944>frogs<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> of <S%G1142>demons<s%>, <S%G4160>working<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%>; which go forth1607, 3739, Nehemiah7 <S%G1909>unto<s%> the kings935, Genesis93, 2532 of the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world<s%>, to <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> together <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G4171>war<s%> of <S%G1565>the<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, the <S%G3841>Almighty<s%>.

(Behold <S%G2400><s%>, I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2812>thief<s%>. <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is <S%G3588>he<s%> that <S%G1127>watcheth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>keepeth<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> he <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1131>naked<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G808>shame<s%>.)

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> which is <S%G2564>called<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew<s%> <S%G717>Har-Magedon<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the seventh1442, 32 poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G109>air<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1831>came<s%> forth a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G575>out<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%>, <S%G3772><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, It is <S%G1096>done<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G796>lightnings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1027>thunders<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake<s%>, such <S%G3634>as<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> since575, 3739 there <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, so <S%G3173>great<s%> an <S%G4578>earthquake<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5082>mighty<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G1096>divided<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3313>parts<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> was <S%G3415>remembered<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, to <S%G1325>give<s%> unto <S%G846>her<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of the <S%G2372>fierceness<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3520>island<s%> fled <S%G5343>away<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3735>mountains<s%> <S%G2147>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5464>hail<s%>, every stone <S%G5613>about<s%> the weight of a <S%G5006>talent<s%>, cometh <S%G2597>down<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> because <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4127>plague<s%> of the <S%G5464>hail<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G4127>plague<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4970>exceeding<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%>.
